content.detailedDescription: Went out to close gate and saw the object in the sky. it cross the sky quietly and in a straight line toward the south east. all i could think of was wow is that neat.
content.summary: Large ball of light in sky flying over no noise at all.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard checking out the sky when i saw a bright yellowish light in the sky flying towards me from nw direction.  at first i thought it was an airplance or helicopter, but it didn't have red or white or any other blinking lights, the light was bigger than a plane light and it was going much faster than a plane.  as it flew overhead and slightly to the side i noticed it was leaving a white trail.  i thought of calling my friends outside but the light dimmed but then it got bright again as it continued in se direction.  i ran for my friends, and one came out and saw it too as it continued se.  the light dimmed and brightened a couple of times, then it appeared to be stopping but that may have been illusion.  then the lights were gone.  it was very cloudy and it appeared to disappear behind clouds a couple times on its trip across the sky.  definitely not a meteor.  it traveled from one end of my view of the sky, over my head, and continued as far as i could see in a straight line at the same speed until it maybe appeared to stop before it disappeared.  my friend and i both know it was not anything we've seen before.  he thought it looked like something entering the atmosphere.  he said something about the movie predator.  i felt like it was another of many ufo sightings, kind of nervous but what can you do?  i saw the one they say was a missile on november 7.  it looked like a helicopter with a spotlight on it right over my front yard when i saw it here in los molinos which is northern california.  looked like it was gonna land out front.  then i ran for my binoculars and when i came out it had moved west and was going straight up and it looked like a missile to me with the binoculars.  but that's a whole other event. sorry.  anyway, about five minutes after the fireball flew over, what looked to be a chemtrail plane flew over where the fireball disappeared going from south to north leaving a thick chemtrail  behind it.
content.summary: Fireball flew overhead

content.detailedDescription: Fernley nevada . 6:30 pm app. took dogs of in front yard.  saw the light approaching from a great distance to the north west of me.  heading south east.  extremely bright, bright, large orange solid light, it was so bright i could see the trail of something behind it being illuminated a great distance behind the object.    i watched it from one horizon to the other north west to south east. took less that 2 minutes. i did take a short video but it was so high up you can see it but cant see the clarity.  i think it may have been a rocket, or missal, a very large very fast missal. if not that then a ufo.  after it passed over my position it became extremely bright and white.  i believe it was out of the atmosphere.   i waited to hear any sound as i knew how high this thing was and there was no sound.  surprising for its speed and size.    i would not be making this report without merit.  this was something  large fast and way up there. i am sure other people saw this thing and would think you will receive other reports.
content.summary: Solid bright orange light / extremely high / either ufo or missal / very very fast /

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at 6:06 pm where baseline road and watt meet. i saw an orange orb in the sky and instantly knew it wasn't a plane. i was thinking its a drone because beale afb is less then 20 miles away and i see them from time to time. it was heading in a straight direction south east away from sacramento. then when it got directly overhead i saw it had a vapor trail behind it. this was no drone. for a second i saw a red flicker come off end of it like when space shuttle or rockets boosters have those come off end of them. i got out of my car and didn't hear a noise. then it disappeared. i really feel this was a man made object. if i had to make my best guess i would say it was a missle. then it just burned out. the one thing i wish i could of seen was what shape it was. but the orange glow and the vapor trail behind it made that impossible. another important detail was this looked like it was in atmosphere where jets would fly, not in space.
content.summary: Rocket or missle

content.detailedDescription: While walking around the block with my son i noticed a strange light.   it looked like an afterburner to a jet but was silent and had no visible sign of any craft.  elongated fireball would be a good description but was a very consistent orange.   it was the brightest object i the night sky and travelled fault quick. much quicker than any jet i've seen but slower than a shooting star.  maybe a missile test? not many military bases nearby though.  strange enough to report.   never saw anything like it in my life.
content.summary: Saw a strange light in the sky while walking with my son

content.detailedDescription: I was at home i let my dog out the back door as always to go bathroom each night before bedtime.  always at 11 night and i wait on him. as i first opened my back door a half-ball that was a real dark blood red looking to my right just floating towards my house from the s/e. going towards the n/e.At first i thought it was a plane or chopper but i did not see any of the lights they have on them or any noise coming from it and the half-ball was just above the tree`s floating along making no sounds .As i went out the door more, i then saw a very white cloud to my left that had black lines though it going around the cloud like a strip but faded at the edges and it was the only cloud in the sky ,it was very low to the ground which i thought was strange.It also was just above the tree line.And it looked to be over the river.I saw no other clouds or stares out.At first i thought i was just seeing things.Then as i watched the half-ball starting in the front of the ball away from me i saw a fast white light flash then soon as it went out i saw another light flash behind the ball soon as it went out i saw a light closer to me in front of the ball flash i kept looking also to my left to see what the white cloud was doing.It had gotten bigger round then before and closer to me .Just when i thought i was just seeing things again.The lights flashed the same as before again and as i looked to my left again.The cloud had opened up like a big funnel,and the half-ball floated to the front of it and in a blink of an eye it was at the other end of the cloud funnel no bigger then a car from being bigger then my house before.I kept watching it to see if it would come out the other side but it did not .As i kept watching the cloud it just closed up the closet to me and in a few seconds it swilled all together and just disappeared.I sat there for a while to see if anything would show back up.But that was it.All i can say is i saw a u.F.O and i saw it go into what i feel and believe to this day was a worm hole.And yes i have not reported it till now.For one i don`t want anyone making fun of me .And i wanted to see if anyone else had reported seeing what i did.I saw nothing on the news or in the papers or on one of your t.V shows.No i did not tell my wife.She is a no-believer of u.F.O`s.Yes i made a drawing and put the date and time and all the info  i just told you here. of what i saw back then.
content.summary: Saw a half ball that was dark blood res and to my left a white cloud with black lines around it

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It started in mid august this year. my friend and my kids would see them in the sky in threes. just lights. flashing red and green on top and solid white on bottom. we see them every single night even now we arecwatching them i send this. they come at sun down as a lightvthat just appears and then there will be 4 or 5 more come. they hav little lights that flash silver fly to and from them, then they fly down like 10 15 above our car. they are varied in shape. some are boomerang shaped some are triangle some are tall thin rectangular. they remain until sun up. we watch them appear n fly around, back up into space and come back, reappear in othervplaces all over the sky... this is insane... awesome but insane... you guys must come checkvthis out. you wont believe this unless you see it for yourself.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Happens every night since august. there are too many to count

content.detailedDescription: I was parking my car. the sky was dark and clear, full of stars, a place were i often can see starlights, so i was looking up in the sky waiting four a starlight. and then i saw this bright light from west 30 degrees above the horizon, like a plane but 3 times brighter and without positionlights and it was moving a bit faster then all planes that cross my house. so i lose sight in 35 degrees east above horizon.  now i watched it zoomed in before i wanted to delete the film. i can't explain what it was. maybe somebody saw anything like this before.
content.summary: Orb like light

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling alone, by car, stopped at the intersection of us hwy 12 and hennepin county road 6. ( this intersection has now been changed significantly) this area is about midway between the towns of long lake and maple plain, mn. i (and my car) was facing south, waiting to turn west onto hwy 12.
  i noticed a flying craft, heading east, paralleling u.S. 12. it was the exact color and shape of a common chickens egg, (white variety). the diameter i estimate at 15-20 ft. i estimate the speed at approx. 80 mph. i estimate the altitude at 300 ft.(maximum). it was well under the intermittent cumulus cloud cover.
it was right in front of me. i had an excellent view for 5-8 (?) seconds.
 i knew immediately it was not something recognized by mainstream science. i knew it was what is commonly referred to as a ufo, likely extraterrestrial in origin. i was neither frightened nor particularly surprised.
i lost sight of the craft as it headed east, out of view.
i have extensive experience working visually with distances and altitudes.

i have 2 other personal sightings of differing (ufo) craft, ( one with an additional witness). both occurred within a mile of this sighting location.
i will submit them separately.
i have a family member who had an interesting sighting while as a child in the 1940's.
content.summary: I observed an egg shaped airborne, flying craft,15-20 ft. diameter, flying west to east at approx. 80 mph

content.detailedDescription: Going south on i95 at mm 320. bright light about the size of 1/2 full moon. just above clouds. (thin curtain of cloud cover at about 20k feet) moving at about 100 mph going south. lit up the area on the road under it. got brighter then dimmed and went back to normal, before blinking out. might have been a large meteor, if not for going so slow. i have never seen anything like it before. i have grown up in central fl and know what a launch looks like.
content.summary: Larg orang/yellow light that brightened the area under it. traveling about 100 mph

content.detailedDescription: I was setting on my front porch about 3 40 in the morning and noticed a suddenly appearing orange red orbs light . it was present for about 20 seconds and then appeared to collapse to the center. i got a good look at it and just set there and wondered what it was. ablout s15 minutes later it appeared again same size and color. it had moved about 100 feet but was at the same height. it again disappeared in a collapsing fasion with out making any sound whatsoever. i went in the house and got my binoculars and came back out to look for it but saw nothing in the night sky. it was a moonless morning and very dark. i was not afraid or bothered by watching it just wondered what it was. i have seen ufos before in my lifetime.
content.summary: Large orange red orbs light larger than a harvest moon at the lorizon. appeared suddenly for about 20 seconds then contracted. appeared again about 100 ft away for about 20 secs.

content.detailedDescription: In the forest. warm tingling sensation over my body and something approach me in a figure to replicate a humanoid. stared me directly into my eyes. i may be traumatized. never have i ever felt such a sensation. ever since then i have felt the same sensation over my body almost daily. i'm scared and baffled at the same time.
content.summary: No ufo. just the being

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving home to go to the local college for a theatre production i was cast in. when i stepped outside i looked into the sky and thought "what a bright star, must be a planet", but something was off about it. it was bright yellow with a hot white center and it didn't twinkle, but rather it pulsates ever so slightly. i was completely in awe of it. there was indeed an airplane in the sky, but this light did not come from the commercial airliner i saw. i didn't see the plane until after the light had vanished. it was in the sky to the west. it was very bright and lighting the neighborhood up slightly even though it appeared to be very far away. after vanishing i saw a commercial airplane in the sky where it had been, but then it was in the south sky and the airplane was still off to the west.  i tried very hard to explain it away like maybe it was ball lightning, but the research i did on that just doesn't add up to what i witnessed at all. i've seen spacecrafts
before. i'm a septic of all things, an atheist even, but i know there are beings out there. i've seen it too many times. the evidence is right in front of me, i can't ignore what is physically there. i saw a chrome like spacecraft once and my wife was with me and she saw it too, it got very close to the top of our car on a country road. i feel like i'm being watched. i'm really not paranoid, this is something that's happening to me and until now, i've never reported it for fear of being called a lunatic.
content.summary: Very bright light in sky that abruptly changed position from south sky to west sky

content.detailedDescription: June20 2015 2pictures  and their is  more  pictures  within  others  pictures  plane on bottom  for different type of view the full range from the sky it's  high quality  up above is the  object 2015 also have a gage from the  plane at the  bottom  in movement just  so amazing  for  us too  see it took it's  time in  movement in the  night and beautiful night
content.summary: Took the picture of the ufos off my balcony with my friend

content.detailedDescription: Over rush lake, outside of rush city mn i saw a football like shape comprised of solid red lights which, by there arrangement one could tell the object was a 3 dimensional oval prism that shined too bright to determine wether the object was transparent on the other side of the lights. on the left tenth or so of the foot ball shaped object was a difference in lights both color and texture-wise the surface of the object seemed to (uniformly) emit light and was akin to a police car's lights if there was no white strobe and also not flashing but only pulsating. this was distinguishable as the rear of the object because the direction of motion was towards the opposite side of the object. the object appeared to be at an altitude of 300 feet and noiselessly traveled east to west (ish) at a speed between 30 and 50 miles per hour before leaving my field of view, i know of two other witnesses who also witnessed this back in late summer 2015.
content.summary: The main part was solid red lights, the rear had red and blue pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my residence.
i didn't notice it until i reexamined video of snow i had filmed on my iphone to send to my family in turkey. i decided to slow down footage and noticed the ufo.
i immediately thought it was a ufo.
it was unwavering/ quick and blue.
i felt amazed and also shocked at what i saw.
i lost sight quickly.
content.summary: I was sitting in front of my window watching the snow fall, when this ufo appeared. i did go back and view this video in slow motion as presented to you.

content.detailedDescription: Multiple lights spotted over i-26 in the north charleston area. up to 6-10 lights viewed in low cloud cover with an almost orb like glow. triangle formations made up the arrangements and they seemed to cover about half a miles distance in length.  lights were all moving from nw to se and some moved faster and came extremely close to each other. my viewing time was probably for only 10 seconds driving on the highway but it was pretty incredible. they way some accelerated close to one another made me considering ruling out helicopters. this area is close to the charleston airport and military bases which is something to consider. since i only had exciting seconds to view the objects i wanted to see if anyone else saw these lights.
content.summary: Multiple light over charleston i-26

content.detailedDescription: Me encontraba dentro de un bosque nublado en el valle, cerca del pã¡ramo de la culata haciendo fotografã­as a la textura de los pinos, de repente entro la neblina de forma repentina y acelerada y todo se nublo a tal intensidad que todo era una pantalla blanca, y prã¡cticamente la visibilidad era difã­cil, sin embargo me quedã© en el mismo sitio haciendo una secuencia de fotos porque me parecã­ã³ interesante la textura de la neblina y un brillo inusual dentro del bosque, estuve dentro del bosque de 5 a 10 minutos, luego regresã© a mi vehã­culo, no preste mayor importancia luego, hasta que al descargar las fotos pude observar algo fuera de lo nornal que hasta la fecha no se que es, porque ni siquiera estaba lloviendo para decir que haya sido una gota de agua.
content.summary: Objeto brillante dentro de un bosque de pinos sector el valle, cerca del pã¡ramo de la culata, mã©rida-venezuela

content.detailedDescription: I was combing got the trucks full about 1 o'clock am i left in the trk went about 100 feet down the prairie red got out of the trek to roll the tarp as i was about to roll tarp my combine lit up like it was daylight i went and shut off the trek to see if i could hear any noose there wasn't a sound i jumped in the trek and took off never did look back never tarp the trk i still think about it i thought at first it might be a helicopter but there wasn't a sound also my combine was parked close to power line almost under it there is an airbase about 35 miles from the spot l don't think they had helicopters that didn't make noise then 1981 if it was airfares there probably still laughing
content.summary: Combing quit for night stopped to roll tarp a light lit up my combine no sound

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 2 friends were out of our car on nevada rt 375, 40 miles from rachel, nv.  without warning, i/we heard the sound of a very low-flying jet go by us, low.  (i am former air force, and am familiar with these sounds.)  all three of us scanned the sky, my friends looking at higher elevations.  i looked at low elevations and quickly did a 360° scan, knowing that if you have heard it, it's already gone by.  none of us saw any craft at all.  the continuing sound did not last long, indicating that it was probably very low-level. the day was clear and the visibility excellent. did we encounter a cloaked jet fighter?
content.summary: Possible cloaked jet heard but not seen by 3 in nevada 2014

content.detailedDescription:
Brandon, manitoba (canada)

sighted on saturday, august 1951
shape: disc | duration: 30 minutes

note: i originally sent a letter containing the following information to the center for ufo studies, box 1402, eviston, illinois, usa c/o dr. j. a. hynek in the late 1970's or early 1980's. i never received confirmation that the letter was received.I have included the following account of my 1951 observation. place: brandon, manitoba time: saturday morning(7 am), summer of 1951 length of observation: approximately 30 minutes description of object: saucer shaped, wingless aircraft, 4 ft. to 6 ft. in diameter, 2 ft. to 3 ft. in height, bottom half: black, top half: clear canopy with a 1 ft. square black box centered under the canopy, no insignias on the craft. speed of craft: varied from 0 mph to max. of 5 mph propulsion: no sound, smell, light or visible means of propulsion description of observation: me and another 5 year old boy (cannot recall his name) were playing catch with a ball in front of fleming elementary school located in south west brandon, manitoba. the craft was first observed by the other boy when he missed catching the ball that i had thrown to him. i asked him why he had missed the easy catch and he told me to look over my right shoulder into the sky. the object was first seen as round and black, about the size of a quarter, against a white cloud. the craft slowly descended until it reached about 30 ft above us and about 30 ft to the west. the craft was tilted on a 45 degree to the ground. it leveled off and stayed motionless for a few minutes. it then began to move at about 5 mph directly over our heads until it stopped across the street a few inches above some power lines. it wobbled slightly as it hovered in this position for about 30 minutes. during this time i threw a rock at the craft but was unable to reach it. i shouted to the other boy to notify some adults residing in the nearby houses but he did not want to leave the area. i started to feel afraid, thinking it might be a russian bomb, and crossed the street to a park about 50 ft away from the craft and sat on the grass without taking my eyes off the craft. the craft hovered a few inches over the power lines. after about 20 minutes the craft started to move at a right angle ne away from the power lines at a speed of about 5 mph and ascended over my head, disappearing into the clouds. when i arrived home my father was angry. he told me that i was away from home for several hours and that i should learn to tell time. i was unaware that i was away for that length of time. the next morning, just before sunrise, i was visited in my bedroom by a man in black standing at the foot of my bed. i heard a sound, which woke me up, like many bees buzzing. small, lit dust-like particles were swarming at the foot of my bed. the particles converged forming the image of the man in black. at first he was translucent, ghost-like, and wore a black suit. he then became solid. he had white hair in a pompadore style. he did not make a noise but moved his right arm in a slow upward motion of greeting. a whiteish, blue light was emitted from his direction. i was so scared that i hid under the covers of my bed in terror. i must of finally fell asleep and when i awoke everything was back to normal.
content.summary: Two events - 1rst lasted 30 minutes, 2nd lasted 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription: 3 ufo's spotted in bangalore city sky next to orion's belt. first there were 2 and they moved along up n down like north n south around 150 km in real length. and later joined by third ufo all did a 8 figure movement and all joined as one and vanished.
content.summary: 3 ufo's spotted in bangalore near sky orion's belt

content.detailedDescription: My best friend and i were in the woods at her families land of their future home. it was on a hill and very heavily wooded and secluded area. we were lying on the hood of her car just looking up at the sky talking. she saw the light first and thought it just a bright star. then as it moved and got brighter she pointed it out to me. we kept watching it get brighter and closer wich was happening at an alarming rate. it seemed just like seconds it was right in front of us. we froze not able to process what was happening. it hovered and wind just lots of loud whirling wind everywhere and then the 2 square bright boxy like lights beamed right onto us. it came even closer. we believed it was after us. it was a triangle shape and we could see directly under it itwas just very dark but i could see indentions and a couple of details under it such as the gray tone to it. it all happened so fast.It was so quick our hearts were pounding we screamed get outa hear. so we scramble to get off the hood and into the car. my friend put the car in reverse to turn it around and the wind was still on top of us it seemed to follow us for a few seconds it got very close to us maybe it was hovering half a treetop above us at the time we were leaving.When we were driving we were so scared we never looked back. just frozen and a mad will to survive. we had had no alcohol or drugs. we were good girls and we drove to a church next to her house and sat there to reflect on what just happened. we did not talk to many people about it. i just told my fiance and we never much talked about it after to each other. i had no idea about mufon.
content.summary: It looked like a bright star off behind trees, then it got brighter and brighter then it was hovering over us with wind and two bright beams of light pointing down on us.

content.detailedDescription: Tout a commancé il y a 4 ans alors que nous habitionts miramas ma compagne et moi meme, alors que je sortait mon chien dans le jardin vers 23h50 jai a deux reprises en trois jours d'intervale pu observés deux tres gros vaisseaux a basse altitude, le premier ressemblé a une structure en l invercé il émété une lumière qui brillé de l'interieur j'en sui resté bouche bé. le second qui ai passé au dessus de chez moi étai quand a lui plus effrayant, un tres grans v tres sombre qui émété sur sa surface une éspèce d'éléctricité visible, et avait 5 demis spheres en son dessous ils ce déplace en silance pas le moindre bruit. quelques semaines apres je suis aller dans de la famille a 780km de mon domicile et la nuit jai pu aussi en observé, mais la sa commance a faire beaucoups pour moi, car depuis nous avont deménagés a saint chamas et la les phénomènes ne cessent pas et survolent toujour mon domicile. ma compagne et moi avont pu assisté a un phénomène gigantesque, au printemps 2014 vers 18h30 nous avont vu deux formations pyramidale inverssé de sphère tres brillante or argent bleu, ils y en avait plus de 100 d'un coups et ma compagne en a étai tres surprise
content.summary: Plusieurs évènement en v spères tube et autres

content.detailedDescription: I was at home  at the address above which is a condo. i've had some paranormal happenings for the last few years. i was fighting with my boyfriend and he decided to sleep out in his van in the driveway. i was lighting a cigarette on the stove and had a scratch off ticket in my hand. the next thing i know i'm waking up on the floor of my bathroom in fetal position. the cigarette i had and ticket were on the floor in the kitchen apparently id dropped them. and then a few days later i looked at my phone and saw these 40 pics that neither i or my bf had taken. when u truly look at the detail you see they are other worldly and cannot be faked. i'd love if someone could get back to me on this. all my contact info is recent. i have more photos than i could post.
content.summary: See photos/appeared on my phone taken by brings. i believe i was abducted that night

content.detailedDescription: I was out ufo hunting in manhattan, with my phone camera. i had a feeling that if i walked around in east harlem where i live that i might see something. i live on 117th and lex so i walked south on 3rd ave first. i saw several fast moving strange lights, but i couldn't capture them on camera. they were too fast. then at 109th i walked over a block to lexington ave. there was a strange whiteness in the clouds and this was at night. i tried to take a photo of it, and the photo data on my camera says the flash was off, but there was a big flash of light when i took the picture, which came out looking like a black saucer that i have seen in daylight before, but did not have a camera handy.I saw it once in colorado, and had two really good daytime sightings in new york. this photo really surprised me, and it still don't know what it is.
content.summary: I was ufo hunting and saw a strange whiteness in sky, took picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife took the dog outside to her business. wife asked me to look at an odd bright red light heading from north east toward northwest toward bremerton washington. after a fast glance i 
got my 10 power nikon binocular. object appeared about 3 to 5 miles away, 1 to 2 thousand feet high. very bright red, unblinking and silent. sky was fair to clear. slight overcast due to rainy weather. the time was 8 pm. as the first object headed toward bremerton, two similar bright red objects followed, heading toward bremerton. although i didn't have a tripod, i had a good look and knew the object was not an aircraft. a few moments afterward, the 4th object appeared. traveling in the same direction. a few minutes later a commercial jet appeared, flying from seatac airport heading sw towards the olympic mountains. no other aircraft sighted. sighting lasted about 5 to 6 minutes. i am a air force vietnam veteran, retired from castle afb, ca. closed in 1995. 


20 december 2015
content.summary: 4 bright round, nonblinking and silent objects.

content.detailedDescription: Have had several incidents regarding alien encounters and information that has been downloaded into my mind. i have no mental illnesses but this is starting to scare me because it is not common information. and yes, i have actually had a physical encounter.
content.summary: Information downloaded into mind.
